description.p: This package represents OpenRTM-aist that's built within ROS eco system. Although being ROS-agnostic by itself, you can use this via ROS together with the packages in rtmros_common that bridge between two framework.

OpenRTM-aist is an RT-Middleware-baseed, component-oriented software platform to robotics development that is made and maintained in AIST (National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology) in Japan (excerpts from here)
Note the its original development and maintainance is happening in AIST's repository. The URLs of the development repository and the issue tracker URLs shown is a port to rtm-ros-robotics project.
